post.description: Performs an optional age/disability verification after documents are submitted. Checks if the user meets certain age or disability thresholds.

journeyId.description: Unique identifier for the verification journey.

ageFrom.description: Minimum age for eligibility (can't combine with ageTo).

ageTo.description: Maximum age for eligibility (can't combine with ageFrom).

minDisabilityPercentage.description: Minimum disability percentage required for eligibility.

journeyId.description: Unique identifier for the verification journey.

ageResult.description: Indicates if the individual meets the age requirement.

disabilityResult.description: Indicates if the individual meets the disability criteria.

post.description: The Phone ID service provides identity checks and enriched data linked to a phone number. It includes several optional modules for age verification, breached data, call forwarding detection, contact information, contact match, number deactivation, subscriber status, porting history, porting status, SIM swap, and active call status.

400.description: Bad Request - Malformed syntax in the request.

404.description: Not Found - The server could not find the requested resource.

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded.

500.description: Invalid Transaction - Transaction not attempted due to a system issue.

503.description: Service Unavailable - System is temporarily unavailable.

datasource.description: Identifier for the data source used in verification.

country.description: Country associated with the data source.

dob.description: Date of birth in the format YYYY/MM/DD.

overall.description: Overall operation status (OK, NOK, REVIEW, ERROR).
